resources.string: Offer is to put forth or suggest for consideration, acceptance or rejection.\nAn example of offer is to make a bid on a house. ..\nAn example of offer is the act of putting in a bid on a house. An example of offer is the suggested sum of $30 per hour for tutoring.

An offer is a conditional proposal made by a buyer or seller to buy or sell an asset, which becomes legally binding if accepted. An offer is also defined as the act of offering something for sale, or the submission of a bid to buy something.
